Cat looked sad while Trina shot down her perfectly reasonable idea, but her face perked up with a new idea.

1. Cat is determined. She'll act normal for now, but when Trina's back is turned, she's going to drink the shrinking potion so she can pay for her transgressions.

Trina shrugged and agreed. "Sure, I'll find something to watch, you can get us drinks and popcorn."

Trina grabbed her tiny sister from the coffee table and set her on the couch next to her as she flipped through available movies.

Meanwhile Cat put popcorn in the microwave and started looking through the Vegas' fridge. "What do you want?" Cat called over to Trina.

"I have a drink in the dark blue cup in there. I usually add some fruit flavoring in it too, if you can find it," Trina called back.

Cat easily located the dark blue cup and set it on the counter. She did a quick scan of the fridge and the red bottle from before caught her eye. It did say on the label it tasted like strawberries, that's a fruit!

Cat poured the red liquid into Trina's drink, causing it to fill nearly to the brim. She then took the cap from the bottle and filled it with water for Tori, and got herself a water bottle. Tori looked up at her sister in shock, immediately knowing what had happened. Timed perfectly, Trina quickly shrank in size on the couch, and within seconds she was the same size as her shrunken sister.

1211211211.title: Cat

12112112111.content:
Cat arrived at Hollywood Arts that morning, more excited than usual, which is saying a lot. She loves her school and she loves her friends, and most days are truly great. But today is even greater, because she made a new little bug friend that gets to stay with her all day.

Her only disappointment today was that her friend Tori was absent. She texted her, but hasn't gotten a response yet. She figured Tori was probably sick and sleeping in, she'd get a reply later.

---

Tori suffered down in Cat's pink converse. She was covered in sweat, probably as much Cat's as her own. She was being squeezed from both sides, an immense amount of pressure from the two slick, fleshy walls on either side of her. And worst of all was the atmosphere, the smell. It was hot, Tori felt like she was burning up. It was humid, too. It was like the worst of humid Summer days down here, the kind where you felt like you swam as much as you walked through the air. And of course, to make the terrible combination as bad as possible, it reeked of sweat and feet.

Tori knew Cat had done a lot of walking today, and it was pretty hot outside, but she never could have imagined her small adorable friend could have such sweaty, smelly feet. Or that she would ever have to experience up close and so very, very personally.

Cat would never intentionally cause harm to one of her friends, but she wasn't the brightest bulb in the bunch and she could definitely be very playful. Tori just had the worst of luck, for Cat to think she was just a bug. Wait, how did Cat normally treat bugs? Tori would need to have a long conversation with her when this was all over.

---

Cat found that while her tiny bug friend was fun to play with during her fun classes, it was really, really fun to play with during her boring classes. She could scrunch her toes and feel it squirm between them. She loved the way that felt. She also liked to try her best to dislodge it from her toes, and see if she could capture it again.

She knew her bug friend was having even more fun than her. She was giving it a party, just like she promised. Cat was almost a little jealous, a party with giant toes sounded really silly...and fun!

She had to stifle her giggling during class, while she paid more attention to her imagination than anything the teacher was saying. She could picture her little bug in its own little club room, her shoe, doing complex and super fun dances with her toes. And the bug was so happy and grateful she invited it!

Cat was easily distracted, however. The moment anything else caught her attention, she would forget about the bug completely for a while. Usually she would remember in the next class, when the bug started to squirm a lot. But by the time she got to her dance class, she had completely forgotten about the bug for the rest of the day.

---

Tori had begun to pick up on the rhythm of her personal hell. She didn't know Cat's schedule perfectly, but she was getting somewhat used to how long Cat was in class. Time felt a lot different trapped in Cat's shoe.

She could tell which classes Cat liked better. When Cat was enjoying class, her toes moved more absent-mindedly, and her torment of Tori was very accidental. But when Cat was in a class she found boring, she played with Tori.

Tori liked the classes Cat didn't a lot more. When Cat got bored, her toes became much more purposeful and active. They moved and wiggled with intent. The massive digits worked to dislodge Tori from her prison.

At first, she was grateful. After all the walking in the morning, Tori thought she was glued in between Cat's toes with no escape. But with lots of effort and several minutes of toe wiggling, Cat had freed the miniature girl. But Tori came to learn being lightly crushed between two toes was safety. Because now that Tori was free, the toes wanted to play for real.

Tori had been well acquainted with Cat's big and second toes, but she had been lucky enough to not meet the rest. Now, Tori was in front of all five digits, each wiggling in excitement. She had no room to back up, as Cat's sock kept her extremely close. And so her toes had no trouble grabbing Tori's tiny body, and pounding into her, smashing her repeatedly underneath them.

Tori felt Cat's entire foot bob while the row of toes slammed into Tori's body, coating her in a new light sheen of sweat, and coating her back from the damp insole. Sometimes the toes slammed her, sometimes they grabbed her. Tori was scrunched in the arch under Cat's toes, she was scrunched between more sets of Cat's toes, she was even forced back to her original position between Cat's biggest toes, though of course not oriented the same.

It seemed as if Cat had a lot of particular fun with taking on the challenge of repeatedly freeing Tori from her toes, and then forcing her back between them. Through the process of doing this multiple times, through several classes, Tori learned that there was seemingly no limit to the amount of positions and orientations she could find herself in as she was crammed between Cat's toes. Her least favorites involved going face first, of course. Face first and upside down was one of the worst.

Before lunch, Cat had freed Tori from between her toes, but when the bell rang she walked to lunch before securing Tori again. This was the first time Tori had experienced walking while not secured, and it had terrible results.

Tori spent Cat's entire lunch with her face pressed into the wet interior of Cat's white sock, while her giant friend pressed down on her with the ball of her foot. But Tori's hair was free from the ball of Cat's foot, and unfortunately two of Cat's smaller toes had caught the majority of Tori's hair between them. Whenever Cat's toes would flex, or absent-mindedly wiggle or scrunch, Tori's hair would get pulled harshly and she would yell out in pain. But no one could hear her tiny yells of pain inside Cat's shoe.

How does the rest of Tori's day go?

1. As well as it can, given the circumstances. Cat actually remembers to check on her bug after her dance class, which through circumstances leads to her finally learning her bug is actually Tori!

2. Continually bad. Cat's completely forgot about her bug and goes through the rest of her school day without remembering the bug. The real problem being, she forgets at home, too.

3. As poorly as possible. Tori doesn't survive Cat's dance class.

12112112121.content:
But all of Tori's pleas fell on deaf ears. This was the moment Jade had been waiting for for over a year and half (yes, this exact scenario). At last her greatest rival would be gone forever and she'd be the top dog once again.

Jade opened her mouth showing Tori her mountainous teeth and tree sized tongue before she dropped the miniature girl into the abyss, swallowing a second afterwards and sending Tori deep into the bowels of the titanic goth.

"Hah." Jade smirked as she felt the Latina slide down her esophagus. "I should eat more Latin food." She laughed. As Jade began to walk away however, she felt Tori stop moving. "Oh trying to get out huh? Well we have something for that." Jade smirked as she reached for her water bottle.

Before Jade could take a sip however, she dropped the bottle, doubling over while clutching her stomach as she felt her insides be pounded on and bent out of shape. "OW fuck! What the hell are you doing Tori?"

Typical Jade. Eating someone and then complaining about them fighting back.

Jade made another attempt to reach the water bottle only for her to start coughing up blood. Tori must have punctured an internal organ.

"How the hell is she doing this? She's six inches tall." And that was Jade's last thought before a full size Tori burst free from her body like the alien bursting free from John Hurt. And like John Hurt's character, Jade was completely dead. She would not be missed or mourned by anyone. In fact, the day she disappeared would come to be viewed as a holiday by all, especially her family.

"Ugh, yuck." Tori commented, rather cavalier about the whole experience, as Jade's internal fluids dripped off of her. "Should probably get rid of this body. Still shrink potion only lasts an hour and... what's this?"

Tori bent down to Jade's purse to find another shrink potion, no doubt a backup that Jade had planned to force feed Tori should things have not gone according to plan. Unscrewing the top, Tori allowed a drop to fall on Jade's bloodied corpse, shrinking it down to nothing. "And the rest of this... well?" Tori smirked looking back at her house.

An hour later, Trina Vega woke up, expecting to see her miniature sister cleaning her shoes on the floor. Trina let loose a yawn and stretched only to pause. "That's not right." She commented. She never had this much room on her king size bed let alone the sofa. Looking around she paled as everything was fifty times its ordinary size, Trina herself now trapped in the crevice caused by her formerly super-sized ass.

"Hi Treen." Tori called up from above. Trina turned to see her little sister, now utterly gigantic in comparison to her, smiling down at her. "Ready for some sisterly bonding?"

Tori winced as Jade's massive thumb pushed down on her little body.

"Beg me Vega." Jade said coldly. "Beg me to stop."

"Please." Tori cried, hot tears streaming down her cheeks. "What did I ever do to you?"

"What?" Jade snapped as she applied even more pressure, causing Tori to scream even louder. "You stole my roles, you stole my confidence, and you're trying to steal Beck. I was everything and you made me nothing!"

Tori should have known. "I didn't steal anything." She managed. "They gave the roles because they thought I was better suited for them. Beck's only a friend, I SWEAR!"

"Lies!" Jade screamed as she wrapped her fingers around Tori and hoisted her to eye level. "All lies. You're here to thwart me."

"You're insane," Tori said, "You always have been but this-" Tori was cut off as Jade began to squeeze. Jade smiled as her arch rival was nearing death. "Now it's my turn to make it shine. It's always been about me." Tori fought to stay awake but her vision soon began to black out.

Now what happened next Tori didn't quite follow. One second she was near death, the next she fell face first onto Jade's bed. Through the pain she felt, she vaguely made out what sounded like a struggle, with Jade on the losing side, before she felt something large crash down next to her.

When Tori opened her eyes, she was greeted to the sight of Jade's massive blue/green eye only it seemed dead. Hesitantly, Tori took a few steps forward and poked the eyeball a few times to no reaction. Unlikely as it seemed, the gigantic goth was dead.

New noises caused Tori to look up and see her gigantic sister. "No." Tori said as she tried to hide in Jade's hair only for Trina's massive fingers to seize her and hoist her upwards. Tori thrashed about, rather like a hamster, but couldn't fight her sister's titanic grip. While Tori feared she would wind up somewhere degrading, she was instead cuddled up against Trina's soft cheek. It was then that Tori realized the noises, Trina was crying.

"Never scare me like that again." Trina said in a serious tone. "I would kill myself if you died because of me."

"You made me a slave." Tori shot back.

"I was joking around!" Trina snapped, sounding very insulted. "You seriously think I wouldn't take care of you like this? For god's sake, I just strangled Jade to death for you."

Tori looked back to the dead goth. "Oh... thanks. But I'm still stuck like this."

"Yeah I've been thinking about that. If Cat told you about the Shrink Potion, she probably knows something about it. Let's go." With that, Trina dropped Tori into her ample bosom.

"Trina!"

"Oh come on, where else am I gonna keep you where you won't be crushed? I may be your sister and will always be there when you need me, but I'm still your sister and am gonna give you hell."

Tori rolled her eyes as she leaned against Trina's breasts. At least Trina was helping her. "Mrs. West I killed your daughter!" Trina cried as she walked out of the house. "That's nice." Jade's disinterested mother cried back.

A short car ride later, the two arrived at Cat's house. "Door was unlocked, I'm sure that's fine." Trina muttered as she entered.

Pulling Tori out of her breasts, Trina held out her right hand so her little sister could stand. "Which of these is Cat's room?"

"Upstairs. Third door on the left." Tori said as she took in the sheer size of the house. Trina found the room quickly enough and entered "Alright Cat. We have a..." Trina trailed off.

1211211221.content:
Trina wiggled her toes, getting a good feel of her younger sister's plight between them.

"You know Tori, since you're already down there, you might as well do me a favor. You were supposed to be cleaning my shoes while I slept, but you barely did anything. So to make up for it, why don't you clean my feet, instead? You can start between my toes, of course," Trina said, without a hint of a joke. She almost appeared as if she thought this were the sensible course of action, given the circumstances.

Tori yelled, "Are you serious?" in response, but it appears Trina didn't quite hear her. Tori struggled to get out from under Trina's foot, but had no luck. The warm flesh held her in place all too well. Still, Tori refused to degrade herself to such a task. She would not lick anyone's feet, much less her very own sister's. She thought Trina was delusional for even considering the notion.

Trina took notice of the fact that she didn't feel a tiny tongue cleaning in between her toes. She knew what she asked of her little sister would be shocking, so she was willing to give her time to swallow the monumental task before actually beginning. However, a few minutes passed, and she could feel Tori trying to squirm free, but still no licking.

Trina sighed. "Tori, you better get licking. Now." Trina squeezed Tori's minuscule head between her toes, with enough force that she was sure it would hurt, but still gently enough to prevent popping her sister.

Down below, Tori heard her sister downright command her to begin the ungodly task, quickly followed by the gargantuan toes on either side of her head closing in. It happened so quickly, the sweaty toe flesh just collided with both sides of her face and entombed her, before wriggling around and rubbing dirt and sweat all over her. It was quite painful, and Tori worried whether or not Trina might accidentally kill her by using too much force. However, just as quickly as it began, the toes separated, though Tori could not get the way the toe flesh stuck to her face briefly before separating out of her mind.

Defeated, Tori reluctantly stuck out her tongue and began to lick the skin between Trina's toes. Tori was beyond disgusted, and had no words for her shameful task. She would have to live the rest of her life knowing she knew what her sister's feet tasted like. Sweat, dirt, and a hint of something uniquely...just, feet. But of course, only in the worst way. Tori moaned as tears streamed down her face, but she continued her degrading task. When she looked up, she saw her titanic sister smiling down at her.
1211211221.title: Sisterly Bonding

12112112212.content:
Trina felt absolute catharsis. Ever since her baby sister got into Hollywood Arts, it seemed like the whole world had lost its collective mind. She was proud of Tori for getting into the prestigious school too, but ever since she started attending it seemed like everyone kept overlooking Trina in favor of her little sister.

Which just didn't make any sense. Tori was decent, but Trina had real talent. So why was everyone ignoring her and casting her sister in everything? Tori won everyone's praises and Trina's superior talent was completely disregarded.

Trina's frustration and anger had built over time, and was part of the reason her and Tori bickered so often. Well that, and Tori was just sort of annoying.

But now, finally, Trina had catharsis. Her over-achieving, less talented brat of a sister foolishly shrunk herself and was now trapped on the floor under her foot licking it clean. And it felt so good. Literally speaking, her sister's tiny tongue removing the dirt and grime between her toes felt really good, and figuratively speaking, because things finally felt right.

The next hour passed in bliss for Trina, as she had to do little but occasionally instruct Tori which part of her foot to clean next. Other than that, she just felt more relaxed than she ever had in her life.

Down below on the floor, however, was a very different story. While Trina was in heaven, Tori suffered in hell.

The tiny Latina kept waiting for her huge sister to tell her the cruel prank was over. Trina could be rather uncaring at times, so an inhumane prank didn't seem out of her wheelhouse. But every time Tori tried to quit or back away or stop in any way, Trina swatted at her with her massive toes or stopped her with a quick but light stomp and told her to get back to work.

After the first several minutes, Tori finally began to accept that this was no prank. Trina really was making her clean her feet. And so Tori did. Through streams of tears and formerly unfathomable degradation, Tori kept running her tongue across the soft, tan feet of her titanic sister.

Her tongue scraped every last bit of dirt and grime off of Trina's feet, of which there was not too terribly much. Trina's feet were far from filthy, but she had not showered yet today, and on such a small scale Tori was unfortunately able to clean much more thoroughly.

Over the course of the next hour, Tori's tongue became quite dry over a dozen times. Every time this happened, she gave herself a moment to pause and allow her tongue to rest in her mouth to re-moisten. It also allowed her to taste everything on her tongue in much more detail, but this was an unwanted and very unintended side effect. After the first couple of times, Tori learned she did not earn a very long time to try and refresh her tongue, as Trina was fairly impatient.

As Tori came close to finishing her horrid job, she looked like an absolute mess. Her hair was matted with Trina's sweat, her face was covered in some of the grime from between Trina's toes, and minuscule flecks of sock lint and toe jam that would be imperceptible to anyone of normal size clung to the skin of her face.

Trina smiled down at her teeny sister with satisfaction as she finally finished the job she had given her. Knowing Tori had never in her life cleaned anything with her tongue, especially not something so huge to her, Trina was fully impressed with the work she had done.

"You know Tori, I think I've found your calling. You're a much better foot cleaner than a singer," Trina praised. Tori simply looked up at her giant sister looming overhead with despair, tears forming in her eyes anew at her words.

What comes next?

1. Trina moves on to other things. Does she have more in store for Tori? Or maybe she wants to show her sister to someone? Either way, for now, Trina is done tormenting her sister with her feet.

2. Trina slides her shoes towards Tori. She did a great job on her feet, but that doesn't change the fact that she still needs her shoes cleaned.

3. Tori's new life. Trina meant what she said, she had found Tori's new calling. She keeps her sister tiny and never tells anyone. This will be an epilogue chapter.
12112112212.title: Tori the Foot Cleaner

121121122122.content:
"Well, little sister," Trina said while using her foot to slide one of her ankle boots towards her sister, "now that you've made my feet so clean, it's time to do what I asked in the first place. Clean my shoes."

Tori almost flinched as the giant shoe slid towards her, afraid it would topple over and crush her. Once it stopped moving and her fears of being squished by giant footwear abated, she stared up at Trina in disbelief. She just went through that torturous experience and Trina has more work for her?

Just as she was about to level her complaint, Tori saw annoyance show on Trina's face, since her sister hadn't even begun yet. And out of the corner of her eye, she saw Trina's huge toes shift slightly. Her huge, car-sized toes. Perspective came back to smack Tori in the face. She couldn't afford to upset Trina right now.

The filthy, grime-coated tiny sister gave in and begin to lick away at the material of her big sister's shoes.

The highlight of Tori's day was how easy it was to clean the tops and sides of Trina's shoes, as they weren't very dirty to begin with. She ran her tongue over all of it for formality and to make sure Trina didn't accuse her of skipping it, but it wasn't very necessary.

What Tori feared was the bottoms of the shoes. She didn't want to have to taste everywhere Trina had been while wearing these shoes, but it was inevitable.

Once Trina took notice of Tori cleaning all currently available surfaces of the shoes, she set each one on its side and instructed her to clean the soles. Tori sighed dejectedly, and began to lick at the sole. It tasted of rubber, dirt, and grass, mostly. It took Tori a while, but she eventually had the bottom of each shoe spotless. It was degrading and gross, but after cleaning her sister's bare feet, she felt like this was a step up. Not to mention the shoes weren't very worn, thankfully.

Tori felt good about finishing, but was surprised when Trina set the boots upright and picked her sister up between her fingers and brought her over the opening.

"Trina, what are you doing? I'm not going in your shoes!" Tori shouted up at Trina.

"Of course you are, silly. How else will you clean the insides?" Trina laughed in response, then released her sister from her grasp.

Tori couldn't respond before she was in freefall, only to slam into the heel of the shoe. She picked herself up and brushed herself off, looking further into the cavern ahead of her. The ground was a soft tan material, not too terribly worn but clearly never washed in the same way the outside sometimes was. Ahead of her, the inside of the shoe grew dimmer and dimmer, and above was where all light streamed, and she could see Trina sitting on the couch above, attention on her phone.

Tori soaked in her surrounding, then sat on the ground and cried for a good five minutes. How could her sister do all of this? Trina was a pain in the butt for sure, but there wasn't any real animosity in their relationship. They were bickering sisters, but underlying it there was love and sisterly affection.

So how did it come to this? Suddenly Trina's entitlement and resentment for Tori seemed turned up to 11, and she looks like she has no qualms forcing Tori to do such demeaning, inhumane things for her. There should be no reason for Tori to have spent an hour becoming intimately familiar with the taste of Trina's feet, and yet...here she was. How horrible. And then her shoes. Will the nightmare ever end?

Tori considered the possibility that finding her shrunken has caused Trina to see her more as a...toy, than a person. She'd have to remind Trina of her humanity, so Trina could come to terms with her own cruelty and free Tori.

In the meantime, however, Tori set to work. On her hands and knees, she lapped away at the floor, the occasional tear falling from her face. She wouldn't know if she lapped up her own tears, as the ground itself had the slight taste of Trina's sweat.

The further Tori got into the shoe, the stronger the taste got. When she got Trina's attention to be placed in the other shoe, she was almost relieved to start at the heel. The taste of sweat was so much weaker there than the toe of her other shoe.

As Tori was getting closer to finishing, what was Trina thinking about doing next?

1. Now that Tori has done all of her work, it's time for her break. Tori is done cleaning for the day.

2. Tori is really good at this. In fact, Tori owns a pair of sandals Trina really likes...So Trina makes Tori clean her own shoes so Trina can wear them.

3. Watching Tori work is giving Trina an idea...she could probably charge her friends to have Tori clean their shoes (and/or feet?) while they watch. They'd probably pay a lot, too. Though this could be risky, telling people about Tori.
121121122122.title: Tori the Shoe Cleaner

121121122123.content:
Trina had made up her mind. She would be keeping Tori like this. She took her sister to her room and set her on the floor with the shoes she wanted her to clean. She instructed her puny sister to clean them in their entirety, inside and out, tops and bottoms.

She waited a few hours, until Tori had cleaned her shoes, to break the news to her. Tori was furious. She screamed, she threw a fit, she cursed Trina with every ounce of her spirit. When the little Latina saw that her sister was not bothered by her fury, she became desperate and switched to pleading and begging. Trina never wavered.

With access to Tori's phone, it was easy for Trina to fake Tori running away. Whenever questioned, all she had to do was cry and play dumb and no suspicion ever came her way. Soon it became as good as the truth. Everyone believed Tori was gone.

All the while, Trina was enjoying high school life. Her talent still wasn't being recognized, but at least it wasn't accompanied with the frustration of watching her bratty younger sister being chosen for all the things she didn't deserve with her subpar talent.

And Tori's true fate, that only she and Trina knew, was that instead of becoming the pop star she dreamed of being, she became the shrunken foot slave to her talentless older sister. She cleaned Trina's feet every day after school, and after that she cleaned the shoes she wore that day. During school, Tori was trapped in Trina's footwear, doing her best to massage her sister's giant sweaty foot while she went about her day.

After the first year, Tori's will finally began to break. She rarely disobeyed orders, she almost never tried to escape anymore, and she had even stopped complaining. She knew her place in life, and she began to dutifully serve her undeserving sister's feet.

Trina's feet were her world now, and she was no longer a person. Her only job was to keep Trina's feet and shoes spotless, and she became very good at it.

One day, years later, while monotonously cleaning Trina's foot, Tori was lost in thought, as the task had become second nature to her. She often remembered details of her old life, as they kept her sane, even if she knew it was a reality she no longer had access to.

But on this day, Tori realized something that chilled her soul. She had forgotten her old friends' names. She was replaying a fuzzy memory in her head, but she could not name any of her friends anymore. What was the pink-haired one named? She had the easiest name, it was very simple! What was it? She could not remember. Was her hair pink? It was something like that, pink or purple or maybe even red. It was all so fuzzy to her.

For the first time in months, tears found their way down Tori's face. She connected once again to the emotions she had abandoned long ago. No one but her would know or care that in this moment, the tiny girl lapping up the salty sweat underneath her sister's third toe on her left foot was crying because she didn't remember the names of her best friends. No one would know that she was crying also because she realized she no longer thought Trina's sweat tasted disgusting. No one would know that she was crying because the only things she knew to compare the taste to anymore all came from Trina's feet or shoes.

The tiny Latina cried to herself as she carried out her task for the millionth time, remembering that she hated her life. And she cried because she could not change it and she knew that in a week she would be back to how she was an hour ago.

Tori Vega was not a pop star. Tori Vega was a foot slave. People forgot Tori Vega, but they remembered her owner, Trina Vega.

The end.
121121122123.title: Epilogue - Tori the Foot Slave
